languages.text: "Я уже принес извинения. В любом случае, произошедшее — закономерный итог для несанкционированного контакта с живым оружием Арбитес".

traits.locale_text: "И я принес свои извинения. Но этого следовало ожидать — Глейто был при исполнении".

languages.text: "I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."
languages.original_text: "Я уже принес извинения. В любом случае, произошедшее — закономерный итог для несанкционированного контакта с живым оружием Арбитес".

traits.locale_text: "I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."
"I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."
"I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."
"I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."
"I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."

languages.text: 「私はすでに謝罪しました。いずれにせよ、高等裁定局の生きた武器に無許可で接触すれば、ああなるのは当然の結果です」
languages.original_text: "I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: 「私はすでに謝罪しました。いずれにせよ、高等裁定局の生きた武器に無許可で接触すれば、ああなるのは当然の結果です」

languages.text: "Çoktan özür diledim. Gelgelelim Adeptus Arbites'in canlı silahıyla izinsiz temasa geçmenin böyle sonuçları olması da kaçınılmaz elbette."
languages.original_text: "I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Çoktan özür diledim. Ancak bununla birlikte, Adeptus Arbites'in canlı silahıyla izinsiz temasa geçmenin böyle sonuçları olması da kaçınılmaz elbette."

languages.text: «Ya me he disculpado. De todos modos, lo sucedido es el resultado previsible del contacto no autorizado con un arma viva del Adeptus Arbites».
languages.original_text: "I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: «Ya me he disculpado. De todos modos, lo sucedido es el resultado previsible del contacto no autorizado con un arma viva del Adeptus Arbites».

languages.text: “我已经道过歉了。总之，之前发生的事情并不令人意外。在未经授权的情况下，擅自触碰法务部的生化武器，就是会导致这种结果。”
languages.original_text: "I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: “我已经道过歉了。总之，之前发生的事情并不令人意外。在未经授权的情况下，擅自触碰法务部的生化武器，就是会导致这种结果。”

languages.text: « Je vous ai déjà présenté mes excuses. Je tiens à rappeler que cette situation découle d'un contact non autorisé avec une arme vivante de l'Adeptus Arbites. »
languages.original_text: "I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai déjà présenté mes excuses. Je tiens à rappeler que cette situation découle d'un contact non autorisé avec une arme vivante de l'Adeptus Arbites. »

languages.text: "Ich habe mich bereits entschuldigt. Allerdings war das der Erwartungswert für einen unautorisierten Kontakt mit einer lebenden Waffe des Adeptus Arbites."
languages.original_text: "I already apologised. In any case, what happened was the expected outcome from unauthorised contact with a living weapon of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe mich bereits entschuldigt. Allerdings war das der Erwartungswert für einen unautorisierten Kontakt mit einer lebenden Waffe des Adeptus Arbites."
